PathOfBuilding.Notes:
youtube.com/tripolarbear twitch.tv/tripolarbear
If you need help with the build, first read the maxroll article. If you still need help beyond that post in #build discusion in my discord: https://discord.gg/MJXp6Q6
For wave of conviction you can use Rubke Of the Vaal + Spellblade instead of obliteration for a lot of extra damage, at the cost of your explosions
^xB97123 IMPORTANT ^7When you're tackling endgame bosses you should be speccing defield forces on the tree. This allows you to fully pre-load on a boss, and causes your arcanist brand casting curses to refresh the ignites duration so you may focus on dodging mechanics^xADAA47

Skill.label: Level 4: Frostblink - OOS - Holy Totem - Flamewall
Level 8: Rolling magma - Ele Prolif - Combustion
Level 16: Wave of Conviction - Added Lightning
Level 31: WoC - Light - Fast Cast - Combustion
Act 6: WoC - Ignite Prolif - Unbound - Combust
Gloves: Infernal Cry - CALL TO ARMS SUPPORT
